snippet.title: Glypha: Vintage - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
A fast-paced, Egyptian-themed jousting tournament recalls 1980's classic arcade action.

Glypha, the classic shareware game on the early Macintosh, now landed in the 21st Century ... but not too much. It still has that classic early Mac look, but 21st Century hardware acceleration, gameplay and feel. (The consensus seems to be that it is a wee bit harder now.)

Developed by John Calhoun
Published by Soft Dorothy Software

#glypha #glyphavintage #macintosh #steam #steamgames #theforeseenarcade #games #videogame #retrogaming #gaming #retrogames
